column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei afɔbu biara nnyi hɔ ma hɔn a wɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu no ."
column3: "#8.1 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no bi dze ka ho dɛ hɔn a wɔnnantsew honam mu na mbom wɔnantsew sunsum mu no."

column2: "Na Kraest Jesus mu nkwa Sunsum mbra no agye me efi bɔn nye owu mbra no mu."
"Na dza mbra no enntum annyɛ
column3: dɛ ɔnam honam no do yɛ mberɛw ntsi no
column4: Nyankopɔn somaa nankasa ne Ba wɔ bɔn honam suban no mu
column6: dze buu bɔn fɔ wɔ honam mu
column8: "ama mbra no n’ahyɛdze no aahyɛ ma wɔ hɛn a yɛnnantsew honam afamu
column9: na mbom yɛnantsew sunsum afamu no mu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtɔ kɔ honam do no dwen honam dze
column3: na hɔn a wɔtɔ kɔ sunsum do no dwen sunsum dze."

column2: "Na honam adwen yɛ owu
column3: na sunsum adwen dze
column4: ɔyɛ nkwa nye asomdwee."

column2: "Osiandɛ honam adwen yɛ Nyankopɔn do mansotwe na ɔmmfa noho nnhyɛ Nyankopɔn mbra no ase
column3: ampa so orunntum;"

column2: "na hɔn a wɔwɔ honam mu no runntum nnsɔ Nyankopɔn enyi."
"Na hom dze
column3: hom nnyi honam mu
column4: na mbom hom wɔ sunsum mu
column5: ber a Nyankopɔn no Sunsum tse hom mu no. Na obiara a onnyi Kraest no Sunsum no

column2: "Na sɛ Kraest wɔ hom mu a
column3: ɔnam bɔn ntsi nyimpadua no ewu
column4: naaso tsenenee ntsi sunsum no ma nkwa."

column2: "Na sɛ nyia onyaan Jesus fii ewufo mu no no Sunsum tse hom mu a
column3: nyia onyaan Kraest Jesus fii ewufo mu no
column4: nam no Sunsum a ɔtse hom mu no do bɛma hom nyimpadua a owu yi so enya nkwa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: enuanom
column4: yɛyɛ akafo
column5: mbom nnyɛ honam afamu na yɛdze kaw bi
column6: dɛ yɛbɛtsena ase wɔ honam mu:"

column2: "na sɛ hom tsena ase honam afamu a
column3: hom bowu
column4: na sɛ hom nam sunsum mu ku nyimpadua ne ndzeyɛe dze a

column2: "Na dodow a Nyankopɔn no Sunsum no gye hɔn taataa no
column3: hɔn na wɔyɛ Nyankopɔn mba."

column2: "Na hom ennya nkowaayɛ sunsum a hom dze bosuro bio
column3: na mbom hom enya abayɛ sunsum a yɛnam do tsea mu dɛ
column4: Abba

column2: "Na Sunsum nankasa nye hɛn sunsum dzi dase dɛ yɛyɛ Nyankopɔn mba;"
"na sɛ yɛyɛ mba a
column3: yɛyɛ adzedzifo so
column4: Nyankopɔn adzedzifo nye Kraest mu anyɛnkoyɛ adzedzifo
column5: na sɛ yɛnye Kraest hu amandze dze a
column6: yebenya kyɛfa so wɔ n’enyimnyam no mu."

column2: "Na mubu dɛ sesei ber yi mu amandzehu no nndu enyimnyam a wɔrebɛda no edzi akyerɛ hɛn no ho koraa."
"Na abɔdze no rotweɔn dzendzenndzen dɛ wɔbɛda Nyankopɔn ne mba edzi."
"Na wɔdze abɔdze no hyɛɛ adze gyan ase
column3: wɔ enyidado mu
column4: nnyɛ nankasa ne pɛ a
column5: na mbom nyia ɔdze hyɛɛ ase no ntsi a."

column2: "Osiandɛ abɔdze nankasa so wobeyi no mpɔtɔwee nkowaasom no ase akɔ Nyankopɔn mba enyimnyam adehyedzi no mu."
"Na yenyim dɛ abɔdze no nyina si nkrum dɛ ɔbaa a ɔroko awoo bodu ndɛ."
"Na nnyɛ abɔdze no nko
column3: na hɛnankasa so a yɛwɔ Sunsum no aba a odzi kan no
column4: hɛn so yesi nkrum wɔ hɛn mu rotweɔn abayɛ no a wɔdze bɔpon nyimpadua no."

column2: "Na enyidado mu na wɔgyee hɛn nkwa: na enyidado a wohu no nnyɛ enyidado
column3: na dza obi hu no
column4: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na n’enyi bɛda do?"

column2: "Na sɛ hɛn enyi da dza yennhu do a
column3: nna yɛdze abotar tweɔn."

column2: "Dɛmara so na Sunsum no suo hɛn mu wɔ hɛn mberɛwyɛ mu
column3: osiandɛ yennyim mbrɛ yendua mbɔ mpaa a ɔsɛ; na Sunsum nankasa na ɔdze apensi a onnyi kabea dzi ma hɛn."

column2: "Na nyia ɔpɛnsa akoma mu no nyim Sunsum no n’adwen mbrɛ ɔtse
column3: osiandɛ odzi ma ahotseweefo no dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ne pɛ tse."

column2: "Na yenyim dɛ hɔn a wɔdɔ Nyankopɔn no
column3: ɔdze adze nyina bɔ mu yɛ edwuma ma hɔn yieyɛ
column4: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔnam ne tsirmpɔw do afrɛ hɔn no."

column2: "Na hɔn a ohun hɔn siei no
column3: hɔn so na oyii hɔn too hɔ dɛ wɔnye ne Ba no suban nsɛ
column4: ama ɔno dze

column2: "Na hɔn a oyii hɔn too hɔ no
column3: hɔn so na ɔfrɛɛ hɔn
column4: na hɔn a ɔfrɛɛ hɔn no
column5: hɔn so na obuu hɔn bem
column6: na hɔn a obuu hɔn bem no
column7: hɔn so na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn enyimnyam."

column2: "Nna afei yɛbɛka dɛn wɔ iyinom ho? Sɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ hɛn afa a
column3: woana na obotum asoɛr etsia hɛn?"

column2: "Ɔno a ɔannkam nankasa ne Ba
column3: na oyii no mae wɔ hɛn nyina ntsi no
column4: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na ɔnnkɛfa adze nyina aka no ho adom hɛn?"

column2: "Woana botum atoatoa hɔn a Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi hɔn no? Nyia obu bem nye Nyankopɔn."
"Woana nye nyia obu fɔ? Kraest Jesus a
column3: ɔno a owui
column4: nyew
column6: nyia ɔtse Nyankopɔn nyimfa no a
column7: na ɔnoara so na odzi ma hɛn no."

column2: "Woana bɛtsew hɛn efi Kraest dɔ no ho? Ahohia
column3: anaa ahomtsew a
column4: ɔhaw anaa ɔkɔm

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column3: Ɔwo ntsi woku hɛn daa nyina; Woebu hɛn dɛ nguan a woruboku hɔn."

column2: "Naaso iyi nyina mu yɛnam nyia ɔdɔɔ hɛn no do dzi konyim bor do."
"Na megye dzi ampa dɛ
column3: owu anaa nkwa
column4: anaa abɔfo
column12: anaa abɔdze biara nnkotum atsew hɛn efi Nyankopɔn dɔ no a ɔwɔ hɛn Ewuradze Kraest Jesus mu no ho."
